title: "SEC faces fierce pushback on plan to police AI investment advice"
excerpt: "The SEC’s July proposals, focused on predictive data analytics and dubbed “Reg PDA” by the industry, are designed to combat the risk that the scalability of AI-related advice could hurt more investors, more rapidly than was possible with earlier technologies."
